com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.buddy

Class BuddyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.App42Service
      • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.buddy.BuddyService

  • public class BuddyService
extends App42Service
    Buddy service allows you to send or get request in buddy management on the cloud.

        Unfriend the friend from friend list.
        Parameters:
        userName - - Name of the user who is going to unfriend the friend.
        buddyName - - Name of the buddy which has removed from friend list.
        callBack - - object for success/exception result.
        Throws:
        App42Exception
